Battera::

She followed Windlord towards the other bots. She sighed. "Really, I 
don't see why you bots can't just find common ground. This war has 
been going on for ages. Surely there must be a resalution between all 
the factions sometime." as she flew behind Windlord.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He winces as he passes through the wall of fire right behind 
Flicker.  
> He beats his wings to put out their smoldering flames.  He 
continues to gain 
> ground on Flicker through shear determination.  "Flicker.  Return 
her now.  
> There's still time.  I will allow no harm to come to you."
